desc:

It also offers Car parking.

It is a new launch project.

The project is spread over a total area of 1.37 acres of land. An accommodation of 39 units has been provided.

About City:

Bangalore is growing in every aspect. The major growth drivers of the city is the booming IT sector that is generating numerous jobs. This has also impacted the real estate market of the city very positively. The city with multi-cultural population and good social infrastructure, excellent educational institutes and constantly upgrading physical infrastructure, witnesses a positive trend in its real estate market. 
The city has a wide mix of luxury housing, mid segment housing and affordable housing.

About City:

The center of India's tech industry, Bangalore has a positive real estate market. The city is located in southern India on the Deccan Plateau and is the fifth most populous urban agglomeration in India. Presence of IT industries and a number of startups make it a forefront of the IT industry in India. The positivity in the real estate market can be attributed to the establishment of IT industries embarking new job opportunities in the city. This allows a number of professionals to move in the city creating a demand especially in the residential real estate market. 
Other factors attributing to this real estate scenario are presence of good infrastructure giving ease connectivity, education and healthcare facilities and the weather conditions.

The airport is almost 28 km away, and Bangalore railway station is nearly 7 km away from the apartment. This helps to make life much simple.

The spacious and luxurious apartments will undoubtedly draw your attention. So without making any further delay, book your site visit today and enjoy a tour of this luxurious apartment.

*Purva Atmosphere is launching "VIDA" Tower 2*

*2 BHK is being launched at a box price of-*
*1.01 to 1.06 cr up to 15th floor**&**1.07 to 1.12 Cr. from 16th to 33rd Floor*

Additional charges will be advance Maintainenace, legal fees, GST

*EOI will be collected with 1 lakh + 4 Lakhs PDC of Jan 21st, 2022*

*Payment schemes for 2BHK*
1. Builder subvention scheme 50:25:25 where 50 percent to be paid now 25 percent in Dec 2022 and balance 25 percent at possession

2. Bajaj offering 90 percent funding option

3. Godrej Housing Finance - 10 percent of agreement value to be paid now by the client and fixed pre-EMI of 10k every month until possession.

Vastu compliant units available

Avail of the offer. It's now or never offer for World Home Collection.

name: Orchid Salisbury
desc:

name: Vajram Newtown
desc: 100% Fresh Lifestyle - The Perfect Statement That Sums Up The Lifestyle On Offer At Vajram Newtown. The Location Is At The Heart Of One Of The Real Estate Hot Spots In Bangalore And Just 4 Km From Manyata Tech Park On Thanisandra Main Road. Spread Across 3 Acres, The Project Comprises Of 272 Units Consisting Of 2 Towers With 18 Floors Each And 3 Levels Of Parking. The Triple Height Podium Landscape And Amenities Provide Grandeur To The Building At The Entrance Level. The Units Have Very Good Spatial Quality. Designed In Such A Manner So That It Opens Up On 3 Sides And Provides Good Ventilation. The Corridors Connecting The Units On Each Floor Are Very Efficient And Well Ventilated. A Central Clubhouse Acts As A Connection Between The 2 Towers At The 18th Floor. Intricate Spaces Carved Out In The Landscape With Many Play Courts Adds On To Premium Living.

name: Keya Life By The Lake
desc:
Keya Life by The Lake

Life by the Lake is a boutique lifestyle development with 50 handcrafted homes (10 blocks of G+3 construction with basement car park). These residences are a combination of large 4/5 BHK duplexes/penthouses on a land parcel of 2.6 Acres.

We have units ranging from 3800 - 4500 Sq. Ft with a private terrace or a private garden.
All-in cost ranges between Rs. 3.86 CR - 5.60 CR exclusive of Registration & Stamp duty.
Each unit would have 3 dedicated covered car parking slots.
The project is ready for interior handovers.
The project is approved by all major banks like SBI, HDFC, Axis, ICICI and Kotak.

The making of Life by the Lake

Life by the Lake Duplexes with pvt garden are crafted keeping nature, design, lifestyle, and technology together. The below are the few initiatives taken in our project to enhance the lifestyle of our esteemed houseowners.

GREEN INITIATIVES : Your homes come with fully loaded green/environment friendly initiatives. Few of them are listed below.
1 KW of Solar Power for each home
ZERO water discharge project with Centralized hot water management, thus there is no need of installing geysers.
Garbage Composting system for your waste management
Sensor based lighting system for optimum usage
Dedicated car charging facility for each home
Provision for centralized VRV AC System Home series to optimize the power requirement

WATER MANAGEMENT : We do understand the sensitiveness towards rationalized use of water and recycling. We have taken a step forward in this design to make this project 100% water neutral. You have a combination of STP / WTP / WWTP / UF / RO / RAINWATER HARVESTING to make sure that we reuse the water to the best possible level and have ZERO dependency on outside water.

SUNLIGHT/VENTILATION/PRIVACY : Your home has been built on east/west orientation to make sure that you get direct sunlight half of the day and day light for the rest of the day. You would have no breach of privacy from any part of your home at our project. We have provided a full length Aluminium French window with maximum opening to ensure that you enjoy the fresh air and light in your home. The glasses of the windows are from Saint Gobain and do have high grade energy/heat efficiency.

MATERIAL/FINISHES : We have handpicked the finishes for your home as you would have done while making your home. Rest be assured to have a pleasant experience when you get to know about the ingredients of your new home.

SIGNATURE LIFESTYLE CLUB VERDE : You would own a dedicated 23,500 SFT Club Verde at your doorstep, where sports meet leisure, pampering you with five-star amenities to make your day-today life dynamic yet soothing. Right from indoor badminton (height as per European Standard), squash court, virtual golf simulator to a heated infinity pool, we have provided amenities for all lifestyles. The club has been designed by Ms Space Matrix; Singapore based firm having hands on experience on designing signature club houses.

HOME AUTOMATION : Your home comes with ease of usage and safety/security is ensured at the same time. We would be providing you home automation from ABB. You would have touch panel switches at your home

desc:

This makes it easier for you to fulfill your aspirations of owning a luxurious apartment in this prestigious project.There are 422 units of 4 BHK Apartment for sale in SNN Clermont, Jogappa Layout, Nagavara, Bangalore, spread across 5 towers.

About the Builder Section - SNN Estates
SNN Estates is a renowned and trusted name in the real estate industry. With years of experience and expertise, they have successfully delivered numerous residential and commercial projects. Their commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction sets them apart from the rest. With SNN Estates, you can be assured of a home that not only meets your expectations but exceeds them.

About the Locality - Jogappa Layout, Nagavara, Bangalore
Jogappa Layout, Nagavara, Bangalore is a prime locality that offers a host of amenities and conveniences. The area is well-connected to the rest of the city, making it easy for residents to commute to their workplaces or other parts of Bangalore. Jogappa Layout is surrounded by reputed schools such as St. Paul's Public School, The New Indian Public School, and Gokul Public School, ensuring that your children receive quality education. There are also several hospitals in the vicinity, including Medicare Hospital, Shirdi Sai Hospital, and Meno Hospital, providing you with easy access to healthcare facilities.For your shopping needs, AN Shopping Complex is just a stone's throw away. The locality also offers proximity to the main highway, ensuring convenient travel options.

Project Amenities
SNN Clermont offers a range of amenities that will enhance your lifestyle and provide you with a luxurious living experience. The project boasts being the tallest building in the locality, offering breathtaking views of the surroundings. The luxurious properties and lake view add to the charm of this project.The outdoor amenities include cricket practice nets, a tennis court, a beach volleyball zone, a walking/jogging track, a children's play area, a basketball court, a skating arena and cycling track, a meditation garden, a barbecue zone, and an outdoor swimming pool.The indoor amenities include a golf simulator, a library zone, a creche area, a cards room, a mini theater, a multipurpose banquet hall, guest suites, a gymnasium, a spa/health club, a conference room, a reading zone, and a provision for a coffee shop. The project also offers amenities in the proposed civic area, such as a badminton court, a squash court, table tennis, billiards/pool tables, and a provision for a departmental store.With these amenities, SNN Clermont ensures that you have everything you need for a comfortable and luxurious lifestyle right at your doorstep.

The project highlights include being accessible to schools, hospitals, and banks, as well as featuring contemporary architecture and comfortable living spaces.The amenities at Orchid Piccadilly include an audio-visual room, barbeque and sitting area, basketball hoop, children's play area, creche, cricket net, function lawn, games room, gym, indoor badminton court, jogging path, kids pool, library, multipurpose hall, senior citizen garden, squash court, steam room, swimming pool, trim trail station, activity room, adult swimming pool, AV room, badminton court, drop-off zone, landscape amenities, multipurpose court, outdoor lounge area, sandpit, and water feature.Specifications for the project include wall finishing with oil-bound distemper, vitrified tiles for living/dining/kitchen and bedrooms, main doors with teak wood frames, granite counter top in the kitchen, ceramic tiles for flooring and dado in the toilets, and 24x7 power backup.With its prime location, impeccable amenities, and trusted builder, Orchid Piccadilly is the perfect choice for those seeking a luxurious and comfortable lifestyle in Chokkanahalli, Bangalore.

name: Samhita Asta
desc:
For those looking to buy a residential property, here comes one of the choicest offerings in Bangalore North, at Kothanur. Brought to you by Samhita Estates LLP, Samhita Asta is among the newest addresses for homebuyers. This is an under-construction project right now, and is expected to be delivered by Jul, 2021. It has a variety of options to choose from that too in a varied budget range.

Samhita Asta Bangalore North is a RERA-registered housing society, which means all projects details are also available on state RERA website for end-users and investors. The RERA registration number of this project is PRM/KA/RERA/1251/309/PR/180905/002002.

Samhita Estates LLP is one of the known real estate brands in Bangalore North.The builder has delivered 17 projects so far. There are 2 projects of this builder, which are currently under-construction.

Read on to know more about must-know features, Samhita Asta, Photos and other exciting facts about the project.

Features & Amenities
  • The project is spread over an area of 0.39 acres.
  • There are around 35 units on offer.
  • Samhita Asta Kothanur housing society has single tower with 4 floors.
  • There is 1 phase in this project.
    PhasesPossession StatusPossession/Completion Date
    New LaunchJul, 2021
  • Samhita Asta Bangalore North has some great amenities to offer such as Solar Water Heating, Visitors Parking and Sewage Treatment Plant.
  • Syndicate bank is a popular landmark in Kothanur.
  • Kothanur has a decent infrastructure to offer. It has 3 educational institutes in the vicinity. Around 1 medical care centres are available in proximity to this location.
  • Property prices in locality has changed 18.8% in last quarter

What is Samhita Asta Address?

Sy.No30/4, K Narayanapura Main Road, Kothanur, K R Puram, Hobli, Bangalore

How is Kothanur, Bangalore North for buying a home?

Kothanur is a AFFORDABLE locality to buy an apartment, as compared to other areas in the surrounding areas. This locality ranks #20 in Top 100 in Bangalore North.
The existing residents of Kothanur gave it an average rating of 3.8, out of 5. Most of the reviews mention that this locality has:

  • Good Public Transport
  • Easy Cab/Auto Availability
  • Good Schools are nearby
  • Markets at a walkable distance
  • Low Pollution
  • Frequent Police Patrolling

The ratings are based on 35 total reviews.

name: Keya Life By The Lake
desc:
Life by the Lake is a boutique lifestyle development with 50 handcrafted homes (10 blocks of G+3 construction with basement car park). These residences are a combination of large 4/5 BHK
duplexes/penthouses on a land parcel of 2.6 Acres.

It has units ranging from 3800 - 4500 Sq. Ft with a private terrace or a private garden.
All-in cost ranges between Rs. 3.86 CR - 5.60 CR exclusive of Registration and Stamp duty.
Each unit would have 3 dedicated covered car parking slots.
The project is ready for interior handovers.
The project is approved by all major banks like SBI, HDFC, Axis, ICICI and Kotak.

Life by the Lake villaments are crafted keeping nature, design, lifestyle, and technology together.
The below are the few initiatives taken in our project to enhance the lifestyle of our esteemed
houseowners.

GREEN INITIATIVES : Your homes come with fully loaded green/environment friendly initiatives. Few
of them are listed below.
-1 KW of Solar Power for each home
-ZERO water discharge project with Centralized hot water management, thus there is no need of installing geysers.
-Garbage Composting system for your waste management
-Sensor based lighting system for optimum usage
-Dedicated car charging facility for each home
-Provision for centralized VRV AC System  Home series to optimize the power requirement 

WATER MANAGEMENT : We do understand the sensitiveness towards rationalized use of water and recycling. We have taken a step forward in this design to make this project 100% water neutral. You
have a combination of STP / WTP / WWTP / UF / RO / RAINWATER HARVESTING to make sure that we reuse the water to the best possible level and have ZERO dependency on outside water.

SUNLIGHT/VENTILATION/PRIVACY : Your home has been built on east/west orientation to make sure that you get direct sunlight half of the day and day light for the rest of the day. You would have no breach of privacy from any part of your home at our project. We have provided a full length Aluminium French window with maximum opening to ensure that you enjoy the fresh air and light in your home. The glasses of the windows are from Saint Gobain and do have high grade energy/heat
efficiency.

MATERIAL/FINISHES : We have handpicked the finishes for your home as you would have done while making your home. Rest be assured to have a pleasant experience when you get to know about the ingredients of your new home.

SIGNATURE LIFESTYLE CLUB VERDE : You would own a dedicated 23,500 SFT Club Verde at your doorstep, where sports meet leisure, pampering you with five-star amenities to make your day-today life dynamic yet soothing. Right from indoor badminton (height as per European Standard), squash court, virtual golf simulator to a heated infinity pool, we have provided amenities for all lifestyles. The club has been designed by Ms Space Matrix; Singapore based firm having hands on experience on designing signature club houses.

HOME AUTOMATION : Your home comes with ease of usage and safety/security is ensured at the
same time. We would be providing you home automation from ABB. You would have touch panel
switches at your home

name: Assetz Soho and Sky
desc:
For those looking to buy a residential property, here comes one of the choicest offerings in Bangalore North, at Jakkur. Brought to you by Assetz Property Group, Assetz Soho and Sky is among the newest addresses for homebuyers. There are apartments for sale in Assetz Soho and Sky. This is an under-construction project right now, and is expected to be delivered by Sep, 2026 .

Assetz Soho and Sky Bangalore North is a RERA-registered housing society, which means all projects details are also available on state RERA website for end-users and investors. The RERA registration number of this project is PRM/KA/RERA/1251/472/PR/250322/004785.

Assetz Property Group is one of the known real estate brands in Bangalore North.The builder has delivered 14 projects so far. Around 2 projects are upcoming. There are 6 projects of this builder, which are currently under-construction.

Read on to know more about must-know features, Assetz Soho and Sky Price List, Photos, Floor Plans, Payment Plans, Brochure download procedure and other exciting facts about the project.

Features & Amenities

  • The project is spread over an area of 4.51 acres.
  • There are around 114 units on offer.
  • Assetz Soho and Sky Jakkur housing society has 5 towers with 13 floors.
  • Assetz Soho and Sky Bangalore North has some great amenities to offer such as Swimming Pool, Solar Water Heating and Visitors Parking.
  • Jawaharlal Nehru Centre For Advanced Scientific Research is a popular landmark in Jakkur
  • Some popular transit points closest to Assetz Soho and Sky are Hebbal railway station and Venkateshpura Metro Station. Out of this, $nearestTransitLabel is the nearest from this location.
  • Jakkur has a decent infrastructure to offer. It has 4 educational institutes in the vicinity. Around 16 medical care centres are available in proximity to this location.
  • Property prices in locality has changed 7.5% in last quarter

name: Aparna Maple
desc:
About the Project - Aparna Maple by Aparna Constructions and Estates Pvt. Ltd.
Welcome to Aparna Maple, a prestigious residential project by Aparna Constructions and Estates Pvt. Ltd. Located in the thriving neighborhood of R.K. Hegde Nagar, Bangalore, this project offers a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience. With its prime location and state-of-the-art amenities, Aparna Maple is the ideal choice for those seeking a modern and fulfilling lifestyle.Aparna Maple is currently under construction, with an estimated possession date of September 2024. The project offers spacious 2 and 3 BHK apartments, ranging from 1165 to 1590 sq.ft. Each unit is meticulously designed to provide maximum comfort and functionality, making it the perfect home for you and your family.With a total of 246 units spread across 2 towers, Aparna Maple offers a sense of exclusivity and privacy. Rest assured, Aparna Maple is registered under RERA with the ID PRM/KA/RERA/1251/446/PR/190724/002724, ensuring transparency and accountability.There are 246 units of 2, 3 BHK Apartments for sale in Aparna Maple, R.K. Hegde Nagar, Bangalore, spread across 2 towers.

About the Builder Section - Aparna Constructions and Estates Pvt. Ltd.
Aparna Constructions and Estates Pvt. Ltd. is a renowned name in the real estate industry, with a legacy of excellence spanning over two decades. Established in 1996, Aparna Constructions has delivered numerous successful projects, earning the trust and satisfaction of thousands of homeowners. With their commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction, Aparna Constructions has become a trusted name in the industry.

About the Locality - R.K. Hegde Nagar, Bangalore
Located in R.K. Hegde Nagar, Bangalore, Aparna Maple enjoys a strategic location with easy access to key landmarks and amenities. The neighborhood is home to several prestigious schools, including Sandra Rickets Public School, Hegde Nagar Public School, and United Public School. For higher education, there are renowned institutions like Kristu Jayanti College and Bengaluru Golu College in close proximity.When it comes to healthcare, residents of Aparna Maple have a wide range of options, including Good Health Hospital, Sai Hospital, and Prime Life Hospital. The locality also offers convenient access to shopping malls, with Best Shopping Point being a popular choice for all your retail needs. Additionally, the presence of the metro and its proximity to the main highway ensures excellent connectivity to other parts of the city.

Project Amenities
Aparna Maple offers a host of amenities designed to enhance your lifestyle. The project boasts 3 open side properties, providing ample natural light and ventilation. The lush greenery and peaceful surroundings create a serene and relaxing atmosphere. With its close proximity to schools, it offers convenience for families with children.The

project amenities include a grand entrance lobby, club house, multi-purpose play court, lawn tennis court, swimming pool, kids pool, toddler pool, and jacuzzi. For fitness enthusiasts, there is a gymnasium, yoga/meditation area, and cycling/jogging track. The project also features 24x7 security, CCTV surveillance, intercom, and automated car wash facilities for your convenience.
With its thoughtful amenities and prime location, Aparna Maple offers a perfect blend of luxury and convenience, making it the ideal choice for your dream home.

name: Hanging Garden
desc:
About the Project:
Hanging Garden by Hanging Garden Group is a stunning ready to move residential project in the heart of Vyalikaval HBCS Layout, Nagavara, Bangalore. The project offers luxurious 3 BHK apartments with a minimum area of 1995 sq.ft and a maximum area of 2540 sq.ft. The project is boasts of top-notch amenities and facilities. With 9 towers and 340 units, Hanging Garden is a perfect blend of modern architecture and luxurious lifestyle.

About the Builder:
Hanging Garden Group is a renowned name in the real estate industry, known for its commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. With years of experience in the field, the group has delivered several successful projects across the country. The builder is committed to creating homes that offer a luxurious lifestyle and are built with the highest standards of quality and workmanship.

About the Locality:
Located in Nagavara, Hanging Garden is in close proximity to some of the best hospitals and schools in the area. The project is located just a few minutes away from Columbia Asia Hospital, a leading healthcare facility in the city. The project is also located close to several prestigious educational institutions, including the Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore, and the National Centre for Biological Sciences. The project is well-connected to major highways, stations, and airports, making it easily accessible from any part of the city.

Project Amenities:
Hanging Garden offers a host of world-class amenities and facilities that cater to the needs of modern living. The project features a community hall for social gatherings, a children's play area for kids, 24X7 water supply, power backup, and CCTV surveillance for enhanced security. The project also boasts of a well-equipped club house, car parking, and lifts for easy access. The landscaping and tree planting add to the beauty of the project, making it a perfect place to call home.

desc:

With a construction status of Ready to Move, this project offers 2, 2.5, and 3 BHK apartments ranging from 1057 to 1482 sq.ft. The project consists of 417 units spread across 11 towers. Arvind Skylands by Arvind SmartSpaces Ltd offers spacious and well-designed apartments in various configurations to suit your needs. About the Builder Section - Arvind SmartSpaces Ltd
Arvind SmartSpaces Ltd is a renowned real estate developer established in 2009. With a strong focus on quality and customer satisfaction, the company has successfully delivered several residential and commercial projects. Arvind SmartSpaces Ltd is known for its commitment to excellence and innovation in the real estate industry.

About the Locality - Nehru Nagar, Bangalore
Nehru Nagar, Bangalore is a well-established locality with excellent connectivity and a host of amenities. The area is home to various schools, colleges, hospitals, and shopping malls, ensuring that residents have easy access to all their daily needs. Some popular establishments in the vicinity include Vruksha School, Government Primary School, Yelahanka NES, MEC English Nursery-Primary & High School, The HDFC School, and Cambridge English High School. Additionally, there are several hospitals such as Sparsh Hospital Yelahanka, Ashwini Hospital, and Malavya Hospital, ensuring quality healthcare services nearby. The locality also offers easy access to the main highway, making commuting a breeze.

Project Amenities
Arvind Skylands offers a wide range of amenities to enhance your living experience. The project highlights include a rooftop jogging track, socializing area with hammocks/benches, barbeque area, open cafe on the terrace, and a volleyball court. Other amenities include a pool table, toddlers pool, CCTV surveillance, yoga multi-activity room, carrom, chess, table tennis, and a spa/steam facility. The project also features a skating rink, basketball court, tennis court, walkways, water bodies, and an acupressure/reflexology pathway. With 24x7 security, intercom facilities, and 24-hour water supply, Arvind Skylands ensures a safe and comfortable living environment.

Property for sale in Hebbal, Bangalore. This project, that is, Chitrakut Chitrakut Shelter is a well designed project by Chitrakut Estates. It is offering Ready to Move units. If you are looking at Apartment, you should check out Chitrakut Chitrakut Shelter. Available configurations include 2 BHK, 3 BHK. As per the area plan, units are in the size of 1125.0 sq.ft.. Project possession is slated for Oct, 2010. There is 1 building in this project. Total number of flats at Chitrakut Chitrakut Shelter is 20. Chitrakut Chitrakut Shelter is located in Behind Godrej Woods, 1st Cross, Bhuvaneshwari Nagar, Bangalore. There are 20 units in this residential project.

Come home to Chitrakut Chitrakut Shelter. It offers multiple facilities such as Gymnasium, Power Backup. If you are passionate about sports, you will enjoy the facilities such as Cycling & Jogging Track. There is 24x7 Security. These amenities make this property totally aspirational.

Major banks such as HDFC, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank have approved financing for Chitrakut Chitrakut Shelter.

Chitrakut Estates is a renowned name in the real estate space. Founded in 2000, the company has developed as many as 1 projects.

Social infrastructure like banks, schools and parks surround Hebbal area. It is also very well-connected to various parts of the city by public transport network.

name: Legacy Casero
desc:
Looking for Apartment in Jakkur, Bangalore?. Legacy Casero is a project by Legacy Global Projects Pvt Ltd. The project is offering 3 BHK, 4 BHK. Legacy Casero is a Ready to Move residential project. There are 22 units. There is 1 building in this project. As per the area plan, units are in the size range of 3260.0 - 5900.0 sq.ft.. Legacy Casero is located in Jakkur. Legacy Casero was launched in August 2009.

Legacy Casero offers a host of facilities for residents. This includes Gymnasium, Power Backup. For families with kids, there is Children's Play Area, nearby apart from Swimming Pool. All residents have access to Barbecue Area, Spa/Sauna/Steam, Library, Internet / Wi-Fi, provisions in the project. Other provisions include access to Party Hall, Landscaping & Tree Planting, Sewage Treatment Plant, Multipurpose Room, The property is has Fire Sprinklers. There is 24x7 Security. There is provision for Closed Car Parking. These amenities in Legacy Casero are those that every homebuyer aspires for!.

For home loans, interested buyers can seek financing from major banks like HDFC, Punjab National Bank .

Legacy Global Projects Pvt Ltd is a reputed building firm with 7 projects since its inception in 2006.

Jakkur is well-connected to other parts of city by road, which passes through the heart of this suburb. Prominent shopping malls, movie theatres, school, and hospitals are present in proximity of this residential project.
